text:
@realDonaldTrump My niece can’t get tested for COVID-19 because there aren’t enough tests, Donald.

You lied.

Friends who work in hospitals across this country are running out of masks & gowns because you did NOTHING back in January and still refuse to take action now.

You’re killing Americans.
